divs: Sighting Detailsat 8:30 I watched three object move , the first was a small star like, them a white one, then a yellow, with red bottom, the last one moved really fast and vanished. at l:00 I was looking at the moon, and a saw a bright white light move, I counted as it moved exactly 22 to 25 on and off lights. then it dissappeared. this light was rooftop level. I was awake but not, I was in a cloudy feeling.
Summary: I saw three small orbs move, then later in the night I saw abright white bleeping light.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around January 31st 2010
